description:
Subaru finds himself on the beach, greeted by the sight of Crusch and Rem in swimsuits. Is this some kind of reward?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 9 - Suika Kouryakusen
Re:Petit - Re: Starting Life in Another World from Petit - Petit 9 - Conquering the Watermelon
Re:ぷち Re:プチから始める異世界生活 ぷち9 スイカ攻略戦
